dc:title: Death of an Apostle
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Eulogizes Larry Heaney "the first of the Catholic Worker leaders to die." Called a "saint" by those who knew him, she describes his love of the poor, family life, voluntary poverty, and farming practices.
